subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello Maurice,



Thank you for your email response. We represent a client who seeks viable investment opportunities in different sectors, the core investor wants to invest funds as Provisional Fund Injection {PFI} in the form of a loan with a terminal season in your company.



The investment Portfolio criteria encourage only out right capital investment, of course this will be executed via Bank to Bank, and your company will be in total control of the investment funds without recourse to the core investor, the business decisions, actions etc, are purely your company's prerogative.



This is a brief on the Investment Portfolio:



(1) The investment portfolio, must generate a return on investment (ROI) 4% annually



2) The investment tenor, long term investment at least a minimum of 10 years.



3) The initial capital investment outlay is $5 Million USD, but we have well over $2 Billion USD available for disbursement, if your group/company has a high profile then indicate how much your company can conveniently handle for the 10 years investment period.



For clarity, we insist you must have a live meeting with the core investor's financial team/bankers for identification and use the same opportunities to discuss extensively concerning the subject matter.



If the portfolio craves your interest then avail us with your business plans/investment summary so that we can deliberate over it and forward the investment loan application form to you before we proceed to the signing of the NCNDA contract agreement.



Your response allows us to move forward.
Best Regards

Mr. Mark Smith 

For Good Investments Group Ltd

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello Mr. Mark Smith,

Thank you for your detailed email and the opportunity to be part of this investment portfolio. It sounds like a very interesting proposition.

I'm curious about the Fund Injection PFI, could you please elaborate more on how it works? Also, I would love to know more about the core investor's financial team bankers. What is their role in this process?

As for the business plans and investment summary, I will need some time to prepare them. Could you please provide me with a timeline or deadline for when these documents are needed?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maurice

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello Maurice, 



Thank you for your email response regarding the prospective investment loan portfolio of the core investor Mr. Christoph Zeller, a German/Liechtenstein businessman, be assured that the core investor is ready and willing to release the investment loan funds to you for a period of 10 years investment tenor at the rate of 4% return of investment (ROI), you will be given free hand to handle the investment funds yourself without the core investor interfering, the business decisions, actions are purely your prerogative.



Furthermore, let me know if you can prepare your business plan within one or two weeks, so that the core investor financial team can deliberate over it before we proceed to the signing of the NCNDA contract agreement.



Find attached the investment loan application form for you to fill completely and return it back with your business plan. Your response allows us to move forward.



Have a good weekend.
Best Regards

Mr. Mark Smith

For Good Investments Group Ltd

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello Mr. Mark Smith,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information about the investment loan portfolio of Mr. Christoph Zeller. It's quite intriguing to know that I will be given free rein to handle the investment funds myself, which is a great opportunity.

I do have a couple of questions though, if you don't mind me asking. Firstly, could you please elaborate on what exactly the NCNDA contract agreement entails? And secondly, would it be possible for me to get some guidance or assistance in preparing my business plan?

I'm looking forward to filling out the attached investment loan form and returning it back with my business plan as soon as possible. However, I would appreciate it if you could provide me with some more details regarding these matters.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Have a great weekend too!

Best wishes,
Maurice

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello Mr. Mark Smith,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information about the investment loan portfolio of Mr. Christoph Zeller. It's really exciting to know that I will have the freedom to handle the investment funds myself.

I am curious, though, about a few things. Could you please elaborate on what exactly is meant by "the rate of return of investment ROI"? Also, could you provide some more details about the NCNDA contract agreement? 

Regarding the business plan, I believe I can prepare it within two weeks as requested. However, I would appreciate if you could guide me on what specific aspects or areas should be covered in this plan.

Lastly, I noticed an attachment mentioned in your email but unfortunately, there seems to be no attachment included. Could you kindly resend it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maurice

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello Maurice,



Thank you for your email response, kindly note that, the return of investment (ROI) means the interest rate you will be remitting to the core investor annually before the 10 years when you will completely pay back the core investor capital.



The NCNDA contract agreement is a non-circumvention and non-disclosure agreement which is the final agreement that will bind both parties involved in this investment loan project.



Furthermore, your business plan should be based on your area of experience, you can just make it brief, just let us know the kind of business you will be investing the loan funds in. Find attached the investment loan application as you have requested. I hope this response gives you proper understanding.



Acknowledge receipt of this email and have a good day ahead.
Best Regards

Mr. Mark Smith

For Good Investments Group Ltd

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello Mr. Mark Smith,

Thank you for your detailed response and the attached investment loan document. I appreciate your explanation about the ROI and NCNDA contract agreement, it's all starting to make more sense now.

As for my business plan, I'm considering a few different areas at the moment. Could you perhaps provide some guidance on what types of businesses typically see success with this kind of investment loan? 

Also, could you please elaborate a bit more on how the interest rate is determined? Is it based on the type of business or are there other factors involved?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maurice

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello Mr. Mark Smith,

Thank you for your detailed response and the attached investment loan document. I appreciate your explanation about the ROI and NCNDA contract agreement, it's all starting to make more sense now.

As for my business plan, I'm considering a few different areas at the moment. Could you perhaps provide some advice or examples of successful businesses that have benefited from this kind of investment loan? It would be really helpful to get an idea of what has worked well in the past.

Also, could you please clarify a bit more about how the interest rate is determined? Is it based on the amount of the loan or does it depend on other factors?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maurice

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello Maurice,



Thank you for your email response, you are free to choose any business of your choice, we are not limiting your choice of investment. The interest rate is determined by the total profit you made annually.
Best Regards

Mr. Mark Smith

For Good Investments Group Ltd

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello Maurice,

Thank you so much for your email response. It's great to hear that I have the freedom to choose any business of my liking. That's really considerate!

I'm a bit curious about the interest rate though. Could you please elaborate on how it is determined by the total profit made annually? I'm not quite sure I understand how that works.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best Regards,
Mr.

Best wishes,
Maurice

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body: Thank you for your email response, it 4% of your annual profit you are giving to the core investor.

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. It's quite interesting to learn about the percentage of annual profit given to the core investor. Could you please elaborate more on this? How is this percentage determined and does it vary from year to year? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Maurice

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body: Thank you for your email response, the return of investment ROI is yearly till the 10 years investment tenor.

subject: Re: Reassignment of investment capital
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your quick response. I'm quite interested in the concept of a yearly return on investment. Could you please elaborate more on this? How does it work exactly? And what do you mean by 'investment tenor'? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Maurice
